TriType

TriType: { flightType: FlightType; multiplier: number } | null
  • Defined in index.ts:230

A type of triangle with a flight type and a multiplier, or null if a flight is not a triangle.

TriTypeFuncConfig

TriTypeFuncConfig: { gapDist: number; isFAI: boolean; totalDistFlown: number }
  • Defined in index.ts:241

Contains all the data required to determine if a flight is a triangle.

Type declaration

  • gapDist: number
  • isFAI: boolean

    Whether the triangle is an FAI triangle.

  • totalDistFlown: number

    The total distance flown.

finalizeBestInterimScore

  • finalizeBestInterimScore(config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; interimScores: ReadonlyArray<InterimScore | null>; roundScoreFunc: RoundScoreFunc }): FinalScore
    • Defined in index.ts:320

    Return a final score from the best interimScore from interimScores by applying roundScoreFunc and looking up coord indexes in coords.

    Parameters

    • config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; interimScores: ReadonlyArray<InterimScore | null>; roundScoreFunc: RoundScoreFunc }
      • coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>

        Coords.

      • interimScores: ReadonlyArray<InterimScore | null>

        Interim scores.

      • roundScoreFunc: RoundScoreFunc

        Score rounding function.

    Returns FinalScore

padCoords

  • padCoords(coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>, n: number): ReadonlyArray<Coord>
    • Defined in index.ts:134

    Return an array of coords that contains at least n elements by repeating the last element as many times as necessary. If coords already contains at least n elements then it is returned directly. If coords contains fewer than n elements then a new array is returned, leaving the original coords array unchanged.

    Parameters

    • coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>

      Coords array.

    • n: number

      Minimum length of the returned array.

    Returns ReadonlyArray<Coord>

scoreCHCrossCountryCup

  • scoreCHCrossCountryCup(config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; distKMFunc: DistFunc }): FinalScore
    • Defined in index.ts:394

    Score coords using the SHV's Cross Country Cup 2020 rules. See: https://www.xcontest.org/switzerland/en/rules/. https://www.shv-fsvl.ch/fileadmin/files/redakteure/Allgemein/Sport/Reglemente/2020/ReglementSportif_D_CCC_2020.pdf https://www.shv-fsvl.ch/fileadmin/files/redakteure/Allgemein/Sport/Reglemente/2020/Sportreglement_D_CCC_2020.pdf

    Parameters

    • config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; distKMFunc: DistFunc }
      • coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>

        Coords.

      • distKMFunc: DistFunc

        Function to return distance between two coords in kilometers.

    Returns FinalScore

scoreDistViaThreeTurnpoints

  • scoreDistViaThreeTurnpoints(config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix; flightType: FlightType }): InterimScore
    • Defined in index.ts:191

    Return an interim score for the highest-scoring distance via three turnpoints. It uses a brute force algorithm with a running time of O(N^5) when N is the number of coords, and so should only be used with a few coords.

    Parameters

    • config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix; flightType: FlightType }
      • distMatrix: DistMatrix

        Distance matrix.

      • flightType: FlightType

        The type of returned flight.

    Returns InterimScore

scoreStraightDist

  • scoreStraightDist(config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix }): InterimScore
    • Defined in index.ts:159

    Return an interim score for the highest-scoring distance between any two coords. It uses a brute force algorithm with a running time of O(N^2) when N is the number of coords, and so should only be used with a few coords.

    Parameters

    • config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix }
      • distMatrix: DistMatrix

        Distance matrix.

    Returns InterimScore

scoreTris

  • scoreTris(config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix; triTypeFunc: TriTypeFunc }): InterimScore | null
    • Defined in index.ts:266

    Return an interim score for the highest-scoring triangle flight according to triTypeFunc. It uses a brute force algorithm with a running time of O(N^5) when N is the number of coords, and so should only be used for a few coords.

    Parameters

    • config: { distMatrix: DistMatrix; triTypeFunc: TriTypeFunc }
      • distMatrix: DistMatrix

        Distance matrix.

      • triTypeFunc: TriTypeFunc

    Returns InterimScore | null

scoreWorldXContest

  • scoreWorldXContest(config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; distKMFunc: DistFunc }): FinalScore
    • Defined in index.ts:500

    Score coords using the 2020 World XContest rules. See: https://www.xcontest.org/world/en/rules/.

    Parameters

    • config: { coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>; distKMFunc: DistFunc }
      • coords: ReadonlyArray<Coord>

        Coords.

      • distKMFunc: DistFunc

        Function to return distance between two coords in kilometers.

    Returns FinalScore
